title: Miley Cyrus affectionately coins herself 'Rock N Roll Barbie' alongside 'Ken' boyfriend Cody Simpson
text:
They're seemingly inseparable after going public with their new relationship.

And Miley Cyrus took the liberty of coining her new boyfriend Cody Simpson the 'Ken' to her 'Barbie' as they drove around town on Thursday afternoon.

Miley, 26, sported a black T-shirt and denim skirt as she sat in the passenger seat relaying the lyrics to the Barbie Girl song to her Australian beau.

So romantic: Miley Cyrus took the liberty of coining her new boyfriend Cody Simpson the 'Ken' to her Barbie as they drove around town on Thursday afternoon

Miley wore her bright blonde hair in two braids, with a black newsboy cap on top of her head.

She looked casually cool in a T-shirt and skirt while Cody dressed down in a navy blue long-sleeve behind the wheel.

'Hi, Ken,' she cooed at Cody before he asked: 'You want to go for a ride?'

She followed along to the song and recited: 'Sure, Ken.'

Having so much fun: Miley, 26, sported a black T-shirt and denim skirt as she sat in the passenger seat relaying the lyrics to the Barbie Girl song to her Australian beau

'Hi, Ken,' she cooed at Cody before he asked: 'You want to go for a ride?'

In a cheesy selfie shared to her Stories, the Wrecking Ball singer wrote 'Rock n Roll Barbie & Ken.'

They appeared to take their relationship to the next level with permanent ink earlier this week.

The young couple flashed new tattoos on Instagram Tuesday night before Cody shared a racy selfie with Miley's hand running down his pants.

Fashion first: Miley wore her bright blonde hair in two braids, with a black newsboy cap on top of her head

Music lover: She looked casually cool in a T-shirt and skirt while singing along to the song

She went one step further in her adoration for the Australian musician and commented: 'Need. Oxygen. Can’t. Breathe. I. Stan. For. Ever. Ship.'

Cody's manager told People in a statement that the pair are 'both sober now and are focused on health, work and spending time together.'

'It is early, but their friendship is long-standing and deeper than people realize,' he continued.

Prior to their relationship, Miley was linked to Kaitlynn Carter for a few months after her ex-husband, Liam Hemsworth, filed for divorce following eight months of marriage and 10 years of dating.

The thirst is real: The young couple flashed new tattoos on Instagram Tuesday night before Cody shared a racy selfie with Miley's hand running down his pants
description: Miley, 26, sported a black T-shirt and denim skirt as she sat in the passenger seat relaying the lyrics to the Barbie Girl song to her Australian beau.
